GR14brhms5cu:12: vicāre tu mamātra syād ṛṣīṇāṃ sa ṛṣir gatiḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:13: yadyapy adhyāya-śata-yuk saṃhitā sā tathāpy asau /
GR14brhms5cu:16: tad evātra parāmṛṣṭaṃ tato hṛṣṭaṃ mano mama //
GR14brhms5cu:18: atra tat punar āmṛśya vyākhyātuṃ spṛśyate mayā //
GR14brhms5cu:19: atha śrīmad-bhāgavate yad uktaṃ ete cāṃśa-kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān
GR14brhms5cu:20: svayam [BhP 1.3.28] iti tad eva prathamam āha īśvara iti /
GR14brhms5cu:28: tan-nāma-vargāvirbhāva-kṛtā gargeṇa prathamam uddiṣṭatvena tathā yaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:29: mantram adhikṛtya so'yam ārambhaḥ tatrāgrataḥ paricitatvena mūla-rūpatvāt /
GR14brhms5cu:31: śrī-bhagavad-uktau - nāmnāṃ mukhyatamaṃ nāma kṛṣṇākhyaṃ me
GR14brhms5cu:34: sahasra-nāmnāṃ puṇyānāṃ trir-āvṛttyā tu yat phalam /
GR14brhms5cu:35: ekāvṛttyā tu kṛṣṇasya nāmaikaṃ tat prayacchati //
GR14brhms5cu:36: ity atra śrī-kṛṣṇasyety evoktaṃ yat tv agre govinda-nāmnā stoṣyate tat khalu
GR14brhms5cu:38: tad evaṃ rūḍhitvena prādhānyāt tasya iśvara ity ādīni viśeṣaṇāni / atha
GR14brhms5cu:41: āsan varṇās trayo hy asya gṛhṇato 'nuyugaṃ tanūḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:42: śuklo raktas tathā pīta idānīṃ kṛṣṇatāṃ gataḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:43: bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te /
GR14brhms5cu:44: guṇa-karmānurūpāṇi tānya ahaṃ veda no janāḥ // [BhP 10.8.13-14]
GR14brhms5cu:46: asya kṛṣṇatvena dṛśyamānasya prati-yugaṃ tanūr nānāvatārān
GR14brhms5cu:47: gṛhṇataḥ prakāśyataḥ śuklādayas trayo āsan prakāśam avāpuḥ / sa ca sa ca
GR14brhms5cu:48: śuklādir avatāra idānīṃ sākṣād asyāvatāra-samaye kṛṣṇāṅgataḥ etasminn
GR14brhms5cu:50: ataiva kṛṣṇe kartṛtvāt sarvotkarṣakatvāt kṛṣṇa iti mukhyaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:51: nāma / tasmād asyaiva tāni rūpāṇīty āha bahūnīti /
GR14brhms5cu:53: tan-nāmni prādhyānya-sūcakasya kṛṣṇasya tan-nāmnaḥ prādhānye labdhe -
GR14brhms5cu:54: kṛṣir bhū-vācakaḥ śabdo ṇaś ca nirvṛtivācakaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:55: tayor aikyaṃ paraṃ brahma kṛṣṇa ity abhidhīyate //
GR14brhms5cu:62: tasmād ayam arthaḥ - bhavanty asmāt sarve'rthā iti bhūḥ dhātv-artha ucyate
GR14brhms5cu:63: bhāva-śadavat sa cātra karṣter evārthas tasyaiva prāptatvāt / gautamīye
GR14brhms5cu:65: sattā-vācakam ity ukte ghaṭa-sattaiva gamyate na tu paṭa-sattā na vā
GR14brhms5cu:67: atha nivṛttir ānandas tayor aikyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena vyaktaṃ yat paraṃ
GR14brhms5cu:68: brahma sarvato'pi sarvasyāpi bṛṃhaṇaṃ vastu tat bṛhattamaṃ kṛṣṇa ity
GR14brhms5cu:69: abhidhīyate kintu kṛṣer ākarṣa-mātrārthatvena ṇa-śabdasya ca
GR14brhms5cu:73: brahma-śabdasya tat-tad-arthatvaṃ ca bṛhattvād bṛṃhaṇatvāc ca tad brahma
GR14brhms5cu:77: sattā-svānandayor yogāt cit paraṃ brahma cocyate // iti /
GR14brhms5cu:78: advaya-vādibhir api sattānandayor aikyaṃ tathā mantavyam / śābdikair
GR14brhms5cu:81: pravṛtti-hetur yat paramaṃ sa tad evocyate /
GR14brhms5cu:89: arthaḥ / uttarārdhe yasmād evaṃ sarvākarṣaka-sukha-rūpo'sau tasmād ātmā
GR14brhms5cu:93: tad evaṃ svarūpa-guṇābhyāṃ parama-bṛhattamaḥ sarvākarṣaka ānandaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:95: sa ca śabdaḥ śrī-devakīnandana eva rūḍhaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:99: tamāla-śyāmala-tviṣi śrī-yaśodā-stanandhaye para-brahmaṇi rūḍhiḥ iti / tataś
GR14brhms5cu:104: iti para-brahmatvaṃ ca śrīmad-bhāgavate gūḍhaṃ paraṃ brahma
GR14brhms5cu:120: kāla-rūpeṇa bhagavān tenāyaṃ kṛṣṇa ucyate // iti /
GR14brhms5cu:128: śrī-gītāsu viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat [Gītā 10.42] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:129: śrī-gopāla-tāpanyām-eko vaśī sarvagaḥ kṛṣṇa īḍyaḥ [GTU 1.19] iti / yasmād
GR14brhms5cu:133: yasmin / tad uktaṃ śrī-bhāgavate --reme ramābhir nija-kāma-samplutaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:134: [BhP 10.59.43] iti / nāyaṃ śriyo'ṅga u nitānta-rateḥ prasādaḥ [BhP 10.47.60]
GR14brhms5cu:135: ityādi / tatrātiśuśubhe tābhir bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ [BhP 10.33.6] iti / tābhir
GR14brhms5cu:138: ca / atraivāgre vakṣyate - śriyaḥ kāntāḥ kāntaḥ parama-puruṣaḥ [BrahmaS
GR14brhms5cu:139: 5.56] iti / tāpanyāṃ ca -kṛṣṇo vai paramaṃ daivatam [GTU 1.3] iti / yasmād eva
GR14brhms5cu:143: āhopāyaṃ tam evādya uddhavo yam uvāca ha // [BhP 10.72.15] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:144: ṭīkā ca svāmi-pādānām - ādyo hariḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa ity eṣā /
GR14brhms5cu:149: na caitad āditvaṃ tad-avatārāpekṣaṃ kintu anādi na vidyate ādir yasya
GR14brhms5cu:150: tādṛśaḥ / tāpanyāṃ ca -- eko vaśī sarvagaḥ kṛṣṇa īḍyaḥ ity uktvāha nityo
GR14brhms5cu:151: nityānām iti ca yasmād eva tādṛśatayā ādis tasmāt sarva-kāraṇa-kāraṇam /
GR14brhms5cu:152: tathā ca daśame taṃ prati devakī-vākyam -
GR14brhms5cu:154: bhavanti kila viśvātmaṃs taṃ tvādyāhaṃ gatiṃ gatā // [BhP 10.85.31] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:155: ṭīkā ca - yasyāṃśaḥ puruṣas tasyāṃśo māyā tasyā aṃśā guṇās teṣāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:161: narāj jātāni tattvāni nārāṇīti vidur budhāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:162: tasya tāny ayanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:163: ity anena lakṣito yo nārāyaṇaḥ sa tavāṅgaṃ tvaṃ punar aṅgīty arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:164: śrī-gītāsu viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti / tad evaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:166: ye ca tac-chabdena kṛṣiṇābhyāṃ paramānanda-mātraṃ vācayanti te'pi
GR14brhms5cu:167: īśvarādi-viśeṣaṇais tatra svābhāvikī śaktiṃ manyeran / tasmin na
GR14brhms5cu:168: dvitīyatvena sarva-kāraṇatvena ca vastv-antara-śaktiṃ manyeran / tasmin na
GR14brhms5cu:169: dvitīyatvena sarva-kāraṇatvena ca vastv-antara-śakty-āropāyogāt / tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:171: ko hy evānyāt kaḥ prāṇyād yad eṣa ākāśa
GR14brhms5cu:174: na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate
GR14brhms5cu:178: nanu sva-mate yoga-vṛttau ca sarvākarṣakaṃ parama-bṛhattamānandaḥ kṛṣṇa
GR14brhms5cu:179: ity abhidhānāt avigraha eva sa ity avagamyate ānandasya vigrahānavagamāt /
GR14brhms5cu:180: satyam / kintv ayaṃ paramo'pūrvaḥ pūrva-siddhānanda-vigrahaḥ iti /
GR14brhms5cu:181: sac-cid-ānanda-lakṣaṇo yo vigrahas tad-rūpa evety arthaḥ / tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:182: śrī-daśame brahmaṇaḥ stave tvayy eva nitya-sukha-bodha-tanāv iti /
GR14brhms5cu:187: sattvaṃ khalv avyabhicāritvam ucyate tad-rūpatvaṃ ca tasya
GR14brhms5cu:189: satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ satyam atra pratiṣṭhitam /
GR14brhms5cu:190: satyāt satyaṃ ca govindas tasmāt satyo hi nāmataḥ // [Mbh 5.68.12] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:199: svasthaḥ śete mṛtyur asmād apaiti // [BhP 10.3.24] ity ādi /
GR14brhms5cu:200: eko'si prathamam [BhP 10.14.18] ity ādi śrī-brahmaṇo vākye tad amitaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:203: yasmāt kṣaram atīto'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:204: ato'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ // iti /
GR14brhms5cu:206: janma-jarābhyāṃ bhinnaḥ sthānur ayam acchedyo'yaṃ yo'sau saurye tiṣṭhati /
GR14brhms5cu:213: yamunā, tad adūra-deśe vṛndāvane ity arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:216: brahmaṇā ekas tvam ātmā ity ādau svayaṃ jyotīr iti / tāpanyāṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:226: ca śrī-daśame brahma-stavānte - brahman parodbhave kṛṣṇe [BhP 10.14.49]
GR14brhms5cu:229: vidito 'si bhavān sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ
GR14brhms5cu:235: tato jīvavad dehitvaṃ tasya nety api
GR14brhms5cu:238: kṛṣṇam enam avehi tvam ātmānam akhilātmanām /
GR14brhms5cu:239: jagad-dhitāya so'py atra dehīvābhāti māyayā // [BhP 10.14.55] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:251: tad evam api svābhīṣṭa-rūpa-līlā-parikara-viśiṣṭatayā govindatvam eva
GR14brhms5cu:256: cābhyadhāt [BhP 10.27.23] ity uktvā tat prakaraṇārambhe śrī-śuka-prārthanā
GR14brhms5cu:257: prīyān na indro gavām [BhP 10.26.25] iti gavāṃ sarvāśrayatvād
GR14brhms5cu:261: gobhyo yajñāḥ pravartante gobhyo devāḥ samutthitāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:263: astu tāvat parama-golokāvatīrṇānāṃ tāsāṃ gavām indratvam iti tāpanīṣu ca
GR14brhms5cu:264: brahmaṇā tadīyam eva svenārādhanaṃ prakāśitam -- govindaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:267: tathaiva daśame -- tad bhūri bhāgyam iha janma kim apy aṭavyām
GR14brhms5cu:268: [BhP 10.14.34] ity ādi, śrī-nanda-nandanatvenaiva ca taṃ labdhuṃ prārthanā /
GR14brhms5cu:269: naumīḍya te'bhra-vapuṣe taḍid-ambarāya ity ādi paśupāṅgajāya [BhP 10.14.1]
GR14brhms5cu:271: tad evaṃ govinda-śabdasya nānā-pāramaiśvarya-mayy anyārthatāpi tena
GR14brhms5cu:279: anayor vallabhaḥ proktaḥ svāmī kṛṣṇākhya īśvaraḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:283: prakṛtim iti māyākhyāṃ jagat-kāraṇa-śaktim ity arthaḥ tattva-samūhako
GR14brhms5cu:285: anayor āśrayaḥ sāndrānandaṃ paraṃ jyotir īśvarao
GR14brhms5cu:288: prakṛtir iti svarūpa-bhūtā māyātītā vaikuṇṭhādau prakāśamānā
GR14brhms5cu:292: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna
GR14brhms5cu:295: tad evam atrāpi nanda-nandanatvam evābhimataṃ śrī-gargeṇa ca yathoktam /
GR14brhms5cu:296: prāg ayaṃ vāsudevasya kvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ [BhP 10.8.14] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:298: hi tasya śrī-vasudevasyāpi manasy āvirbhūtatvam evābhimatam /
GR14brhms5cu:301: api dadhāra sarvātmakam ātma-bhūtaṃ kāṣṭhā yathānanda-karaṃ manastaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:302: [BhP 10.2.18] ity ādeḥ / śrī-vrajeśvarayo'pi tathāsīd eva phalena
GR14brhms5cu:305: pūrvāvyavahita-kālaṃ vyāpya tathā tathā sarvatra darśanāt /
GR14brhms5cu:319: pratibandhakaṃ iti sādhūktaṃ prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya iti /
GR14brhms5cu:320: atha śrī-śukadevena tathaiva nirṇītaṃ nāyaṃ sukhāpo bhagavān dehināṃ
GR14brhms5cu:326: atha viśeṣaḥ śrī-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇyāṃ nandas tv ātmaja
GR14brhms5cu:334: atha tasya tad-rūpatā-sādhakaṃ nityaṃ dhāma pratipādayati sahasra-patraṃ
GR14brhms5cu:336: sahasrāṇi patrāṇi yatra tat kamalam / bhūmiś
GR14brhms5cu:340: mahā-bhagavato vā padaṃ mahā-vaikuṇṭhādi-rūpaṃ ity arthaḥ / rūḍhir
GR14brhms5cu:343: bhagavān gokuleśvaraḥ iti śīlārthe tv atra varac-pratyayaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:350: tasya svarūpam āha tad iti / anantasya
GR14brhms5cu:363: mukhya-pīṭham idam ity āha karṇikāram iti dvayena /
GR14brhms5cu:365: yat prakṛtir eva sarvatra mantratvena pūjārthaṃ likhyate ity arthaḥ / yantram
GR14brhms5cu:366: eva darśayati ṣaṭ-koṇā abhyantare yasya tat /
GR14brhms5cu:373: yasyāḥ sā ṣaṭ-padī śrīmad-aṣṭādaśākṣarī tasyāḥ sthānam / prakṛtir
GR14brhms5cu:388: varṇa-rūpatvenāgre uddhariṣyate kāmaḥ kṛṣṇāya iti / yathoktaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:397: kvacid durgāyā adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ śakti-śaktimator abheda-vivakṣayā yathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:399: rādhā durgā śivā durgā lakṣmī durgā prakīrtitā /
GR14brhms5cu:402: yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saiva durgā syād yā durgā kṛṣṇa eva saḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:403: anayor antarādarśī saṃsārān no vimucyate // ity ādi /
GR14brhms5cu:404: ataḥ svayam eva śrī-kṛṣṇas tatra svarūpa-śakti-rūpeṇa durgā nāmeti / tasmān
GR14brhms5cu:407: durgārādhanādi bahu-prayāsena gamyate jñāyate iti / tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:409: jānāty ekā parā-kāntaṃ saiva durgā tad-ātmikā /
GR14brhms5cu:412: muhūrtād eva devasya prāptir bhavati nānyathā //
GR14brhms5cu:419: yayā mugdhaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sarva-dehābhimānataḥ // iti ca /
GR14brhms5cu:420: tathā ca sammohana-tantre jayāṃ prati śrī-durgā-vacanaṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:421: yan nāmnā nāmnī durgāhaṃ guṇair guṇavatī hy aham /
GR14brhms5cu:422: yad-vaibhavā mahā-lakṣmī rādhā nityāparā dvayā // iti /
GR14brhms5cu:423: kiṃ ca prema-rūpā ye ānanda-mahānanda-rasās tat paripāka-bhedās
GR14brhms5cu:424: tad-ātmakena tathā jyotī-rūpeṇa sva-prakāśakena manunā mantra-rūpeṇa
GR14brhms5cu:425: kāma-bījena saṅgatam iti mūlāntargatatve'pi kāma-bījasya pṛthag-uktiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:431: tad evaṃ tad-dhāmoktvā tad-āvaraṇāny āha tad ity ardhena / tasya
GR14brhms5cu:433: arthaḥ / tac ca tad-aṃśānāṃ tasminn aṃśodāyo vidyate yeṣāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:438: viveśa goṣṭhaṃ sa-balo gopīnāṃ nayanotsavaḥ // [BhP 10.36.15] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:439: kaṃsa-vadhānte śrī-vraja-rājaṃ prati svayaṃ bhagavatā - jñātīn vo draṣṭum
GR14brhms5cu:450: rukmiṇī dvāravatyāṃ tu rādhā vṛndāvane vane //
GR14brhms5cu:457: ucchrita-prāntānāṃ vartmāṇy agrima-sandhiṣu tu goṣṭhāni jñeyāni /
GR14brhms5cu:458: akhaṇḍa-kamalasya gokulatvāt tathaiva gokula-samāveśāc ca goṣṭhaṃ tathaiva
GR14brhms5cu:463: prabhāvaḥ satyaḥ śrī-parama-puruṣas taṃ kila bhaje //
GR14brhms5cu:466: tatra go-saṅkhyair iti tu pāṭhaḥ samañjasaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:470: prakaṭitaḥ prabhāvaḥ yena saḥ parama-puruṣaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa ity arthaḥ //4//
GR14brhms5cu:474: caturbhiḥ puruṣārthaiś ca caturbhir hetubhir vṛtam /
GR14brhms5cu:475: śūlair daśabhir ānaddham ūrdhvādho dig-vidikṣv api // // BrS_5.7 //
GR14brhms5cu:476: aṣṭabhir nidhibhir juṣṭam aṣṭabhiḥ siddhibhis tathā
GR14brhms5cu:477: manu-rūpaiś ca daśabhir dik-pālaiḥ parito vṛtam // // BrS_5.8 //
GR14brhms5cu:478: śyāmair gauraiś ca raktaiś ca śuklaiś ca pārṣadarṣabhaiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:482: atha gokulāvaraṇāny āha caturasram iti caturbhiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:484: sarvataś caturasraṃ catuṣkoṇātmakaṃ sthānaṃ śvetadvīpākhyam / tad etad
GR14brhms5cu:493: tatra-viśuddhātmā idaṃ sarvaṃ krameṇa ca ity ādikam uktvā tan-madhye
GR14brhms5cu:494: vṛndāvanaṃ kusumitaṃ nānā-vṛkṣa-vihaṅgamaṃ saṃsmaret ity uktam / tathā
GR14brhms5cu:495: ca bṛhad-vāmane śrutīnāṃ prārthanā pūrvakāṇi padyāni
GR14brhms5cu:496: ānanda-mātram iti yad vadanti hi purāvidaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:497: tad-rūpe darśayāsmākaṃ yadi deyo varo hi naḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:498: śrutvaitad darśayāmāsa svaṃ lokaṃ prakṛteḥ param /
GR14brhms5cu:500: yatra vṛndāvanaṃ nāma vanaṃ kāma-dughair drumaiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:514: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatra chandobhiḥ stūyamānaṃ suvismitāḥ iti
GR14brhms5cu:516: tad evaṃ goloka-nāmā ayaṃ lokaḥ śrī-bhāgavate sādhitaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:518: kṛṣṇe ca sannatiṃ teṣāṃ jñātibhyo vismito 'bravīt //
GR14brhms5cu:519: te cautsukya-dhiyo rājan matvā gopās tam īśvaram /
GR14brhms5cu:520: api naḥ svagatiṃ sūkṣmām upādhāsyad adhīśvaram //
GR14brhms5cu:521: iti svānāṃ sa bhagavān vijñāyākhila-dṛk svayam /
GR14brhms5cu:524: uccāvacāsu gatiṣu na veda svāṃ gatiṃ bhraman //
GR14brhms5cu:526: darśayāmāsa lokaṃ svaṃ gopānāṃ tamasaḥ param //
GR14brhms5cu:527: satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ yat brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam /
GR14brhms5cu:528: yad dhi paśyanti munayo guṇāpāye samāhitāḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:529: te tu brahma-hradaṃ nītā magnāḥ kṛṣṇena coddhṛtāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:532: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatra cchandobhiḥ stūyamānaṃ suvismitāḥ // [BhP 10.28.10-17] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:539: iti śeṣaḥ / jano'sau vraja-vāsī mama svajanaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:541: ity ādi padye janā itivad ubhayatrāpy anya-janatvam aprastutatam iti /
GR14brhms5cu:542: vraja-janasya tu tadīya-svajanatamatvaṃ tena svayam eva vibhāvitam -
GR14brhms5cu:544: gopāye svātma-yogena so'yaṃ me vrata āhitaḥ // [BhP 10.25.18] ity anena /
GR14brhms5cu:545: sa etasmin prāpañcike loke avidyābhir yā uccāvacā deva-tiryag-ādi-rūpā
GR14brhms5cu:546: gatayas tāsu svāṃ gatiṃ bhraman tan-miśratayābhivyakteḥ tan-nirviśeṣatayā
GR14brhms5cu:547: jānan, tām eva svāṃ gatiṃ bhaved ity arthaḥ madīya-laukika-līlāveśena
GR14brhms5cu:559: atha śrī-vṛndāvane tādṛśa-darśanaṃ katama-deśa-sthitānāṃ teṣām ity ata
GR14brhms5cu:561: brahma-hradaṃ akrūra-tīrthaṃ kṛṣṇena nītā punaś ca tenaiva
GR14brhms5cu:562: magnāḥ majjitāḥ punaś ca tasmāt tenaivoddhṛtāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:573: arthaḥ / purā purāṇe nikaṭe prabandhātīta-bhāviṣu iti koṣa-kārāḥ / seyaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:574: ca paripāṭī tat tīrthaṃ mahimānaṃ lakṣyam eva vidhātum iti bhāvaḥ / tatra
GR14brhms5cu:575: svāṃ gatim iti tadīyatā-nirdeśo gopānāṃ svaṃ lokam iti ṣaṣṭhī-sva-śabdayor
GR14brhms5cu:576: nirdeśaḥ / kṛṣṇam iti sākṣān-nirdeśaś ca vaikuṇṭhāntaraṃ vyavacchidya
GR14brhms5cu:580: tatra soma-gatiś caiva jyotiṣāṃ ca mahātmanām //
GR14brhms5cu:581: tasyopari gavāṃ lokaḥ sādhyās taṃ pālayanti hi /
GR14brhms5cu:582: sa hi sarva-gataḥ kṛṣṇa mahākāśa-gato mahān //
GR14brhms5cu:583: upary upari tatrāpi gatis tava tapomayī /
GR14brhms5cu:584: yāṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve pṛcchanto'pi pitāmaham /
GR14brhms5cu:586: brāhmye tapasi yuktānāṃ brahma-lokaḥ parā gatiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:587: gavām eva tu yo loko durāroho hi sā gatiḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:588: sa tu lokas tvayā kṛṣṇa sīdamānaḥ kṛtātmanā /
GR14brhms5cu:589: dhṛto dhṛtimatā vīra nighantopdadravān gavām // [HV 2.19.29-35] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:590: tatrāpāta-pratītārthāntare svargād ūrdhvaṃ brahmaṇo loka ity ayuktaṃ syāt
GR14brhms5cu:592: tatra soma-gatiś caivety api na sambhavati
GR14brhms5cu:593: candrasyānyeṣām api jyotiṣāṃ dhruva-lokādhastād eva gateḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:600: surabhi-lokatve sati sarva-gata ity anupapannaṃ syāt /
GR14brhms5cu:601: śrī-bhagavad-vigraha-lokayor acintya-śaktitvena vibhutvaṃ ghaṭate na punar
GR14brhms5cu:602: asyeti / ataiva sarvātītatvāt tatrāpi tava gatir ity api śabdo vismaye prayuktaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:603: yāṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve ity-ādikaṃ coktam /
GR14brhms5cu:604: tasmāt prākṛta-golokād anya evāsau goloka iti siddham / tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:607: brahma-lokaṃ ca kaunteya golokaṃ ca sanātanam // [Mbh 12.330.68] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:611: iti dvitīyānusāreṇa svar-lokam ārabhya satya-loka-paryantaṃ loka-pañcakam
GR14brhms5cu:612: ucyate / tasmād ūrdhvam upari brahma-loko brahmātmako loko brahma-lokaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:616: satya-lokas tu brahma-lokaḥ sanātanaḥ [BhP 2.5.38] iti dvitīyāt /
GR14brhms5cu:633: vartata iti somaḥ śrī-śivas tasya gatiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:635: viriñcatām eti tataḥ paraṃ hi mām /
GR14brhms5cu:640: someti supāṃ sulug ity ādinā ṣaṣṭhyā luk chāndasaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:643: jyotir brahma tad-aikātmya-bhāvānāṃ muktānām ity arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:644: nanu tādṛśām api sarveṣāṃ kintu mahātmanāṃ mahāśayānāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:650: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ // [Gītā 6.47] iti
GR14brhms5cu:654: sarvordhva-pradeśe gavāṃ lokaḥ śrī-goloka ity arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:657: nitya-tadīya-deva-gaṇāḥ pālayanti dik-pālatayā vartante te ha nākaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:658: mahimānaḥ sacantaḥ yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ [Rk 10.90.16] iti śruteḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:659: tatra pūrve ye ca sādhyā viśve devāḥ sanātanāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:660: te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacantaḥ śubha-darśanāḥ // iti
GR14brhms5cu:662: yad vā tad bhūri-bhāgyam iha janma kim apy aṭavyāṃ yad gokule'pi
GR14brhms5cu:679: tad evam upary upari sarvopary api virājamāne tatra śrī-goloke'pi tava gatiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:681: ataiva sā ca gatiḥ sādhāraṇī na bhavati kintu tapomayī /
GR14brhms5cu:682: tapo'trānavacchinnaiśvaryaṃ sahasra-nāma-bhāṣye'pi paramaṃ yo mahat tapaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:687: āha yām iti / adhunā tasya śrī-goloka ity ākhyā bījam abhivyañjayati gatir
GR14brhms5cu:695: ity-uktānusāreṇa atraiva nighnatopadravān gavām ity uktyā ca
GR14brhms5cu:696: goloka-vāsi-mātrāṇāṃ svatas tad-bhāva-bhāvitānāṃ ca sādhana-vaśād ity
GR14brhms5cu:699: varṇayitvā tasya gokulena sahābhedam āha sa tv iti /
GR14brhms5cu:700: sa eva tu sa loko dhṛto rakṣitaḥ śrī-govardhanoddharaṇeneti / evam eva
GR14brhms5cu:703: brahma-lokaṃ ca kaunteya golokaṃ ca sanātanam // [Mbh 12.330.68] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:705: ekadā sāntarīkṣāc ca vaikuṇṭhaṃ svecchayā bhuvi /
GR14brhms5cu:707: bhakti-rūpāṃ satāṃ bhaktim utpāditavatī bhṛśam // iti /
GR14brhms5cu:709: tat sarvopari goloke śrī-govindaḥ sadā svayam /
GR14brhms5cu:716: vyākhyātaṃ ca - tāṃ tāni vāṃ yuvayoḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmayor vāstūni līlā-sthānāni
GR14brhms5cu:719: bhūri-śṛṅgā mahā-śṛṅgyo gāvo bahu-śubha-lakṣaṇā iti vā /
GR14brhms5cu:723: bhūmau tal-loke vede ca prasiddhaṃ śrī-golokākhyaṃ urugāyasya svayaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:724: bhagavato tac-caraṇāravindasya paramaṃ prapañcātītaṃ padaṃ sthānaṃ bhūri
GR14brhms5cu:726: yajuḥsu - mādhyandinīyā stūyate dhāmāny uśmasi ity ādau / viṣṇoḥ
GR14brhms5cu:727: paramaṃ padam avabhātīti bhūrīti cātra prakārāntaraṃ paṭhanti śeṣaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:730: evaṃ jyotir-mayo devaḥ sad-ānandaṃ parāt paraḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:741: napuṃsakatvaṃ vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma iti śruteḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:745: yatra māyā kim utāpare harer anuvratā yatra surāsurārcitāḥ [BhP 2.9.10] //6//
GR14brhms5cu:748: ātmanā ramayā reme tyakta-kālaṃ sisṛkṣayā / // BrS_5.11 //
GR14brhms5cu:749: niyatiḥ sā ramā devi tat-priyā tad-vaśaṃ tadā //
GR14brhms5cu:752: atha prapañcātmanas tad-aṃśasya puruṣasya tu na tādṛśatvam ity āha
GR14brhms5cu:757: ātmanā antarvṛtyā tu ramayā svarūpa-śaktyaiva reme ratiṃ prāpnoti / bahir
GR14brhms5cu:762: atra -māyāṃ vyudasya cic-chaktyā kaivalye sthita ātmani [BhP 1.7.23] iti
GR14brhms5cu:765: tatrāha / sisṛkṣayā sraṣṭum icchayā tyaktaḥ sṛṣṭy-arthaṃ prahitaḥ kālaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:766: yasmāt ramaṇāt tādṛśaṃ yathā syāt tathā reme /
GR14brhms5cu:768: sugamaḥ / tat prabhāva-rūpeṇa tenaiva sā sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:769: prabhāvaṃ pauruṣaṃ prāhuḥ kālam eke yato bhayam [BhP 3.26.16]
GR14brhms5cu:773: nanu ramaiva sā kā tatrāha niyatir ity ardhena /
GR14brhms5cu:775: bhagavatyeva nityatā bhavatīti niyatiḥ svarūpa-bhūtā tac-chaktiḥ / devī
GR14brhms5cu:778: bhagavatī śrīḥ śākṣād ātmano hareḥ [BhP 12.11.20] iti / ṭīkā ca --
GR14brhms5cu:780: tatra hetuḥ sākṣād ātmana iti svarūpasya
GR14brhms5cu:781: cid-rūpatvāt tasyās tad-abhedād ity arthaḥ / ity eṣā /
GR14brhms5cu:782: atra sākṣāt-śabdena vilajjamānayā yasya sthātum īkṣā-pathe'muyā ity
GR14brhms5cu:785: nityaiva sā jagan-mātā viṣṇoḥ śrīr anapāyinī
GR14brhms5cu:786: yathā sarva-gato viṣṇus tathaiveyaṃ dvijottamaḥ // [ViP 1.8.17] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:788: avatāraṃ karoty eṣā tathā śrīs tat-sahāyinī // [ViP 1.9.142] iti ca /
GR14brhms5cu:789: devatve deva-dehā sā mānuṣatve ca mānuṣī /
GR14brhms5cu:790: harer dehānṛ-rūpāṃ vai karoty eṣātmanas tanum // [ViP 1.9.145] iti ca /
GR14brhms5cu:791: hayaśīrṣa-pañcarātre - na viṣṇunā vinā devī na hariḥ padmajāṃ vinā iti //
GR14brhms5cu:795: yā yoniḥ sāparā śaktiḥ kāmo bījaṃ mahad dhareḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:802: viśva-śaktir iyaṃ sthitā iti viṣṇu-purāṇānusāreṇa prapañcātmanas
GR14brhms5cu:804: puruṣasya liṅgaṃ liṅga-sthānīyaḥ yaḥ prapañcotpādako'ṃśaḥ sa eva
GR14brhms5cu:805: śambhuḥ / anyas tu tad-āvirbhāva-viśeṣatvād eva śambhur ucyate ity arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:806: vakṣyate ca kṣīraṃ yathā dadhi-vikāra-viśeṣa-yogād sañjāyate na tu tataḥ
GR14brhms5cu:808: tathā tasya vīryāvadhāna-sthāna-rūpāyā māyāyā apy aprakaṭa-rūpāyā yā
GR14brhms5cu:809: yonir yoni-sthānīyo'ṃśaḥ saivāparā pradhānākhyā śaktir iti pūrvavat / tatra
GR14brhms5cu:810: ca hares tasya puruṣākhya-hary-aṃśasya kāmo bhavati sṛṣṭy-arthaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:818: vastutas tu pūrvābhiprāyatvam evety āha liṅgety ardhena /
GR14brhms5cu:826: śaktimān ity ardhena tad evānūdya tasmin pūrvoktāprakaṭa-rūpasya
GR14brhms5cu:827: prakaṭa-rūpatayāpunar abhivyaktir ity āha tasminn ity ardhena / tasmāl
GR14brhms5cu:829: maheśvaro'py ucyate tataś ca tasmin bhūta-sūkṣma-paryantatāṃ prāpte liṅge
GR14brhms5cu:830: svayaṃ tad-aṃśī mahā-viṣṇur āvirabhūt prakaṭa-rūpeṇāvirbhavati / yato
GR14brhms5cu:831: jagatāṃ sarveṣāṃ parāvareṣāṃ jīvānāṃ sa eva patir iti // 10 //
GR14brhms5cu:840: sahasraṃ sūte sṛjati yaḥ sa sahasra-sūḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:845: sahasra-śīrṣety ukto līlā-vigrahaḥ parasya bhūmnaḥ ādyo'vatāraḥ iti //11//
GR14brhms5cu:847: nārāyaṇaḥ sa bhagavān āpas tasmāt sanātanāt /
GR14brhms5cu:849: yoga-nidrāṃ gatas tasmin sahasrāṃśaḥ svayaṃ mahān //
GR14brhms5cu:852: ayam eva kāraṇārṇavaśāyīty āha nārāyaṇa iti sārdhena / tāḥ āpa eva
GR14brhms5cu:853: kāraṇārṇo-nidhir āvirāsīt sa tu nārāyaṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇātmakaḥ iti / pūrvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:856: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai nara-sūnavaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:857: tasya tā ayanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //12//
GR14brhms5cu:863: tasmād eva brahmāṇḍānām utpattim āha tad rometi /
GR14brhms5cu:865: tasya saṅkarṣaṇātmakasya yad bījaṃ yoni-śaktāvadhyas taṃ tad eva pūrvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:866: bhūta-sūkṣma-paryantatāṃ prāptaṃ sat paścāt tasya loma-bila-jāleṣu vivareṣu
GR14brhms5cu:867: antarbhūtaṃ ca sat haimāni aṇḍāni jātāni tāni cāpañcī-kṛtāṃśaiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:876: lakṣyate 'ntar-gatāś cānye koṭiśo hy aṇḍa-rāśayaḥ // [BhP 3.11.39-40] iti //13//
GR14brhms5cu:878: praty-aṇḍam evam ekāṃśād ekāṃśād viśati svayam / // BrS_5.18 //
GR14brhms5cu:882: tataś ca teṣu brahmāṇḍeṣu pṛthak pṛthak svarūpaiḥ svarūpāntaraiḥ sa eva
GR14brhms5cu:891: punaḥ kiṃ cakāra tatrāha - vāmāṅgād iti /
GR14brhms5cu:893: brahmāṇḍānāṃ pālakādayaḥ prati brahmāṇḍāntaḥ sthitānāṃ viṣṇv-ādīnāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:898: hiraṇyagarbha-rūpa eva na tu vakṣyamāṇa-caturmukha-rūpa eva, so'yaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:908: tatra śambhoḥ kāryāntaram apy āha ahaṅkārātmakam ity ardhena / etad
GR14brhms5cu:913: atha tais tri-vidhair veśair līlām udvahataḥ kila /
GR14brhms5cu:914: yoga-nidrā bhagavatī tasya śrīr iva saṅgatā //
GR14brhms5cu:917: brahmāṇḍa-praviṣṭasya tu tat-tad-rūpasya līlām āha atha tair ity ādi / tais tat
GR14brhms5cu:918: sadṛśais trividhaiḥ prati-brahmāṇḍa-gata-viṣṇv-ādibhir veśai rūpair līlāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:924: tatra yathā śrīr apy aṃśena saṅgatā tathā sāpīty arthaḥ //17//
GR14brhms5cu:926: sisṛkṣāyāṃ tato nābhes tasya padmaṃ viniryayau /
GR14brhms5cu:935: samavāyāprayogāc ca vibhinnāni pṛthak pṛthak // // BrS_5.23 //
GR14brhms5cu:940: tathā asaṅkhya-jīvātmakasya samaṣṭi-jīvasya prabodhaṃ vaktuṃ punaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:944: parasparaṃ tattvāni yojayann iti yojanānantaram eva nirīhatayā yoga-nidrām
GR14brhms5cu:947: yojayitvā tu tāny eva praviveśa svayaṃ guhām /
GR14brhms5cu:948: guhāṃ praviṣṭe tasmiṃs tu jīvātmā pratibudhyate //
GR14brhms5cu:956: sa nityo nitya-sambandhaḥ prakṛtiś ca paraiva sā //
GR14brhms5cu:959: jīvasya svābhāvikī sthitim āha sa nity ity ardheneti /
GR14brhms5cu:963: rañjitaṃ guṇa-rāgeṇa sa jīva iti kathyate //
GR14brhms5cu:969: pramātṛ-rūpeṇa prakṛtim iva prāptaś cety arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:972: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā iti śrutiś ca
GR14brhms5cu:975: evaṃ sarvātma-sambandhaṃ nābhyāṃ padmaṃ harer abhūt /
GR14brhms5cu:979: atha tasya samaṣṭi-jīvāsthānaṃ guhā-praviṣṭāt puruṣād udbhūtam ity āha
GR14brhms5cu:980: evam iti / tataḥ samaṣṭi-dehābhimāninas tasya hiraṇya-garbha-brahmaṇas
GR14brhms5cu:983: sa jāto bhagavac-chaktyā tat-kālaṃ kila coditaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:985: dadarśa kevalaṃ dhvāntaṃ nānyat kim api sarvataḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:988: atha tasya caturmukhasya ceṣṭām āha sa jāta ity sārdhena / spaṣṭam // 23 //
GR14brhms5cu:990: uvāca puratas tasmai tasya divya sarasvatī /
GR14brhms5cu:991: kāmaḥ kṛṣṇāya govinda he gopī-jana ity api /
GR14brhms5cu:992: vallabhāya priyā vahner mantram te dāsyati priyam //
GR14brhms5cu:998: tapas tvaṃ tapa etena tava siddhir bhaviṣyati //
GR14brhms5cu:1001: etad eva sparśeṣu yat ṣoḍaśam ekaviṃśam iti tṛtīya-skandhānusāreṇa yojayati
GR14brhms5cu:1004: atha tepe sa suciraṃ prīṇan govindam avyayam /
GR14brhms5cu:1005: śvetadvīpa-patiṃ kṛṣṇaṃ goloka-sthaṃ parāt param // // BrS_5.31 //
GR14brhms5cu:1014: sa tu tena mantreṇa sva-kāmanā-viśeṣānusārāt sṛṣṭikṛt-śakti-viśiṣṭatayā
GR14brhms5cu:1016: upāsitavān ity āha -- atha tepe ity ādi caturbhiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1018: sattva-rajas-tamo-guṇa-mayyā rūpiṇyā mūrtimatyā paryupāsitaṃ paritas tad
GR14brhms5cu:1022: balim udvahanty ajayā nimiṣā iti ca
GR14brhms5cu:1032: tad evaṃ dīkṣātaḥ parastād eva tasya dhruvasyeva dvijatva-saṃskāras
GR14brhms5cu:1033: tad-ārādhitāt tan-mantrādhidevāj jātaḥ ity āha atha veṇv iti dvayena /
GR14brhms5cu:1045: tataś ca trayīm api tasmāt prāpya tam eva tuṣṭāvety āha trayyeti / keśān
GR14brhms5cu:1047: aṃśavo ye prakāśante mam te keśa-saṃjñitāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1048: sarvajñāḥ keśavaṃ tasmān mām āhur muni-sattamāḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:1060: ca pīṭheṣu satsv api madhyasthatvena mukhyatayā prathamaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1065: kadācid rahasi tu vailakṣaṇyam ity āha lakṣmīti
GR14brhms5cu:1074: tad evaṃ cintāmaṇi-prakara-sadma-mayīṃ kathā-gānaṃ nāṭyaṃ gamanam
GR14brhms5cu:1077: dvitīya-pīṭha-gatāṃ līlām āha veṇum iti dvayena /
GR14brhms5cu:1088: praṇaya-pūrvako yaḥ keli-parihāsas tatra yā vaidagdhī saiva

GR14brhms5cu:1123: na cyavante hi yad bhaktāḥ mahatyāṃ pralayāpadi /

GR14brhms5cu:1137: darśayāmāsa lokaṃ svaṃ gopānāṃ tamasaḥ param [BhP 10.28.14] ity uktvā,
GR14brhms5cu:1145: [BhP 11.24.27] ity ādau mahā-pralaye sarvāvaśiṣṭatvena brahmopadiśya tadāpi
GR14brhms5cu:1146: tasya draṣṭṛtvaṃ svayaṃ bhagavān svasminn āha --
GR14brhms5cu:1149: purāṇa puruṣaḥ -- ekas tvam ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ [BhP 10.14.20] iti
GR14brhms5cu:1152: tathāpi nava-yauvanaṃ -- purāpi navaḥ purāṇa iti nirukteḥ /

GR14brhms5cu:1158: ete cānye ca bhagavan nityā yatra mahā-guṇāḥ /

GR14brhms5cu:1161: bṛhad-dhyānādau tathā śravaṇāt -- gopa-veśam abhrābhaṃ taruṇaṃ

GR14brhms5cu:1169: ekādaśāt / pureha bhūman [BhP 10.14.5] ity ādi śrī-daśamāc ca /
GR14brhms5cu:1170: yad vā, nanu tasyātulyatve kim iti svārthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1175: nija-bhaktebhya ātma-pradānādināpi na vidyate cyutir yasya
GR14brhms5cu:1178: anādeś ca nety āha anādim iti na vidyate ādir yasya yasmād vā sarveṣāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1179: parama-kāraṇaṃ svayaṃ tu sva-prakāśaṃ kāraṇa-śūnyam ity arthaḥ / nanv
GR14brhms5cu:1180: ekena kathaṃ sarveṣāṃ paripālanaṃ ghaṭate ity ata āha ananteti / anantaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1186: nanu nārāyaṇād evānantādi prākāṭya-prasiddhir ity āha ādyaṃ yasya
GR14brhms5cu:1188: nanu jñātaṃ tasyaiva puruṣākhyānaṃ, nety āha
GR14brhms5cu:1189: purāṇeti yasya vilāsa-vapuḥ puruṣākhyas taṃ nanv āyātaṃ tasya vṛddhatvam
GR14brhms5cu:1190: ity āha nava-yauvanam iti kaiśoram ity arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1192: sa eva kiśora-vayā ity anirvacanatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca /
GR14brhms5cu:1195: vedeṣv iti vedais tattvaṃ jñāyate cet teṣu sulabham ity arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1196: bhaktiṃ vinā na jñāyate ity āha adurlabham iti // 33 //
GR14brhms5cu:1204: panthās tv iti prapada-sīmni caraṇāravindayor agre /
GR14brhms5cu:1205: citraṃ bataid ekena vapuṣā yugapat pṛthak /
GR14brhms5cu:1213: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃs tarkena yojayet /
GR14brhms5cu:1214: prakṛtibhyaḥ paraṃ yac ca tad acintyasya lakṣaṇam //
GR14brhms5cu:1217: śrutes tu śabda-mūlatvāt [Vs 2.1.27] iti brahma-sūtrāt / acintyo hi
GR14brhms5cu:1218: maṇi-mantra-mahauṣadhīnāṃ prabhāvaḥ iti bhāṣya-yukteś ceti bhāvaḥ // 34 //
GR14brhms5cu:1231: jagad-aṇḍa-cayā iti na cāntar na bahir yasya [BhP 10.9.13] ity ādeḥ / aṇor
GR14brhms5cu:1232: aṇīyān mahato mahīyān [ŚvetU 3.20] ity ādi śruteḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1234: āviśya bhūtāni vidadhāti sa vo hi svāmī bhavati [GTU 2.22] / yo'sau
GR14brhms5cu:1245: atha tasya sādhaka-cayeṣv api bhakteṣu vadānyatvaṃ vadann ity eṣu
GR14brhms5cu:1248: āgama-rītyā nitya-tat-saṅgināṃ tat sāmyaṃ śrūyate tathaiva sambhāvyety
GR14brhms5cu:1265: tasya tal-loke vāsa ity āha ānandeti /
GR14brhms5cu:1268: tābhir eva saha nivasatīti tāsām atiśayitvaṃ darśitam /

GR14brhms5cu:1303: yadyapi goloka eva nivasati tathāpi premāñjaneti /
GR14brhms5cu:1310: śrī-gītāsu - ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham [Gītā 9.29]
GR14brhms5cu:1315: kṛṣṇaḥ svayaṃ samabhavat paramaḥ pumān yo
GR14brhms5cu:1319: sa eva kadācit prapañce nijāṃśena svayam avataratīty āha rāmādīnti yaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:1320: kṛṣṇākhyaḥ paramaḥ pumān kalā-niyamena tatra tatra niyatānām eva
GR14brhms5cu:1321: śaktīnāṃ prakāśena rāmādi-mūrtiṣu tiṣṭhan tat-tan-mūrtīḥ prakāśayan
GR14brhms5cu:1329: tvaṃ pāsi nas tri-bhuvanaṃ ca yathādhuneśa
GR14brhms5cu:1330: bhāraṃ bhuvo hara yadūttama vandanaṃ te // [BhP 10.2.40] iti // 39 //

GR14brhms5cu:1347: ataivaikādaśe sva-vibhūti-gaṇanāyāṃ tad api svayaṃ gaṇitam --
GR14brhms5cu:1348: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśa āpo jyotir ahaṃ mahān /

GR14brhms5cu:1350: ṭīkā cātra - paraṃ brahma ca ity eṣā /

GR14brhms5cu:1362: sā brahmaṇi sva-mahimany api nātha mā bhūt
GR14brhms5cu:1365: ātmārāmāś ca munayo nirgranthā apy urukrame /
GR14brhms5cu:1366: kurvanty ahaitukīṃ bhaktim itthambhūto guṇo hariḥ // [BhP 1.7.11] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:1367: atra viśeṣa-jijñāsā cet śrī-bhāgavata-sandarbho dṛśyatām ity alam
GR14brhms5cu:1376: tad evaṃ tasya svarūpa-gata-māhātmyaṃ darśayitvā jagad-gata-māhātmyaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1379: māyā hīti / māyayā hi tasya sparśo nāstīty āha sattveti / sattvasya
GR14brhms5cu:1380: rajas-tamo-miśrasyāśrayi yat paraṃ tad amiśraṃ śuddhaṃ sattvaṃ tasmād api
GR14brhms5cu:1381: viśuddhaṃ cic-chakti-vṛtti-rūpaṃ sattvaṃ yasya tam / tathoktaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1383: sattvādayo na santīśe yatra ca prākṛtā guṇāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1384: sa śuddhaḥ sarva-śuddhebhyaḥ pumān ādyaḥ prasīdatu //
GR14brhms5cu:1385: hlādinī sandhinī saṃvit tvayy ekā guṇa-saṃśraye /

GR14brhms5cu:1387: viśeṣataḥ śrī-bhāgavata-sandarbhe tad idam api vivṛtam asti // 41 //

GR14brhms5cu:1404: 1.2] itivat / tad evaṃ tat-kāraṇatve'pi smarāveśasya duṣṭatvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1409: te te prabhāva-nicayā vihitāś ca yena
GR14brhms5cu:1413: tad idaṃ prapañca-gataṃ māhātmyam uktvā nija-dhāma-gata-māhātmyam
GR14brhms5cu:1422: sa tu lokas tvayā kṛṣṇa sīdamānaḥ kṛtātmanā /

GR14brhms5cu:1431: valabhīṃ tatra krīḍārthaṃ kṛtvā devo gadādharaḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:1432: gopakaiḥ sahitas tatra kṣaṇam ekaṃ dine dine /

GR14brhms5cu:1438: idaṃ vṛndāvanaṃ ramyaṃ mama dhāmaiva kevalam /
GR14brhms5cu:1439: atra ye paśavaḥ pakṣi-vṛkṣā kīṭā narāmarāḥ /

GR14brhms5cu:1441: atra yā gopa-kanyāś ca nivasanti mamālaye /

GR14brhms5cu:1445: atra devāś ca bhūtāni vartante sūkṣma-rūpataḥ /

GR14brhms5cu:1449: etad-rūpam evāśritya vārāhādau te nitya-kadambādayo varṇitāḥ / tasmād

GR14brhms5cu:1481: iti tasmāt kṣīroda-śāyy ādy-avatāratayā tasya yat kathanaṃ tat
GR14brhms5cu:1482: tu tad-aṃśānāṃ tatra praveśāpekṣayā alam ativistareṇa śrī-kṛṣṇa-sandarbhe

GR14brhms5cu:1502: sañjāyate na hi tataḥ pṛthag asti hetoḥ /

GR14brhms5cu:1507: atha krama-prāptaṃ maheśaṃ nirūpayati kṣīram iti /
GR14brhms5cu:1511: śrutiś ca eko nārāyaṇa evāgra āsīt,
GR14brhms5cu:1515: varuṇa-rudrendrāḥ iti tathā sa brahmaṇā sṛjati rudreṇa nāśayati /
GR14brhms5cu:1520: harir hi nirguṇaḥ sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ

GR14brhms5cu:1524: api samādadhāti tato hetoḥ pṛthaktvaṃ nāstīti /
GR14brhms5cu:1538: nārāyaṇaḥ / nārāyaṇa evedaṃ sarvaṃ jātaṃ jagatyāṃ jagad ity ādi / dvitīye
GR14brhms5cu:1545: yas tādṛg eva hi ca viṣṇutayā vibhāti
GR14brhms5cu:1550: guṇāvatāra-maheśa-prasaṅgād guṇāvatāraṃ viṣṇuṃ nirūpayati dīpārcir iti /
GR14brhms5cu:1560: tathā govindena viṣṇur gamyate / śambhos tu
GR14brhms5cu:1562: sāmyam iti bodhanāya tad ittham ucyate /
GR14brhms5cu:1580: viṣṇur mahān sa iha yasya kalā-viśeṣo
GR14brhms5cu:1586: atra ca tam apy evaṃ tat-salakṣaṇatayā varṇayati /

GR14brhms5cu:1596: tad evaṃ devy-ādīnāṃ tad-āśrayakatvaṃ darśayitvā prasaṅga-saṅgatyā
GR14brhms5cu:1597: brahmaṇaś ca darśayan atīva-bhinnatayā jīvatvam eva spaṣṭayati bhāsvān
GR14brhms5cu:1606: brahmā san jagad-aṇḍe brahmāṇḍe vidhāna-kartā vyaṣṭi-sṛṣṭi-kartā
GR14brhms5cu:1611: tataś ca jagad-aṇḍānāṃ vidhāna-kartṛtvaṃ ca yuktam

GR14brhms5cu:1613: ca brahma-viṣṇv-ādyā garbhodaka-śāyina evāvatārās tathāpi tasya
GR14brhms5cu:1623: atha sarve sarva-vighna-nivāraṇārthaṃ prathamaṃ gaṇapatiṃ stuvantīti tasyaiva
GR14brhms5cu:1629: agnir mahi gaganam ambu marud diśaś ca
GR14brhms5cu:1631: yasmād bhavanti vibhavanti viśanti yaṃ ca
GR14brhms5cu:1635: tac ca yuktam ity āha agnir mahīti /
GR14brhms5cu:1644: kecit sa-vitāraṃ sarveśvaraṃ vadanti yathāha yac-cakṣur iti ya eva cakṣuḥ
GR14brhms5cu:1647: yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam //
GR14brhms5cu:1661: ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate
GR14brhms5cu:1664: yas tv indragopam athavendram aho sva-karma-
GR14brhms5cu:1670: ataiva sarveśvaras tu parjanyavad draṣṭavyaḥ iti nyāyena
GR14brhms5cu:1671: karmānurūpa-phala-dātṛtvena sāmye'pi bhakte tu pakṣapāta-viśeṣaṃ karotīty
GR14brhms5cu:1673: samo'haṃ sarva-bhūteṣu na me dveṣo'sti na priyaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1674: ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham // [Gītā 9.29] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:1675: ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate /
GR14brhms5cu:1676: teṣāṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ yoga-kṣemaṃ vahāmy aham // [Gītā 9.22] iti ca
GR14brhms5cu:1681: sañcintya tasya sadṛśīṃ tanum āpur ete
GR14brhms5cu:1685: ya eva ca vairbhyo'py anya-durlabha-phalaṃ dadāti kim uta
GR14brhms5cu:1688: iti bhajāmīty anta-prakaraṇam upasaṃharati yaṃ krodheti /
GR14brhms5cu:1703: śuddhāṃ bhāgavatīṃ tanum iti śrī-nārada-vākyasya ca dṛṣṭyā sarvathā
GR14brhms5cu:1705: vaireṇa yaṃ nṛpatayaḥ ity ādau anurakta-dhiyām
GR14brhms5cu:1706: punaḥ kim ity anurakta-dhīṣu suṣṭhv iti / anena
GR14brhms5cu:1707: goloka-stha-prapañcāvatīrṇayor ekatvam eva darśitam / tad uktaṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:1708: nandādayas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā ity ādi // 55 //
GR14brhms5cu:1712: kathā gānaṃ nāṭyaṃ gamanam api vaṃśī priya-sakhi
GR14brhms5cu:1713: cid-ānandaṃ jyotiḥ param api tad āsvādyam api ca // // BrS_5.65 //
GR14brhms5cu:1714: sa yatra kṣīrābdhiḥ sravati surabhībhyaś ca su-mahān
GR14brhms5cu:1715: nimeṣārdhākhyo vā vrajati na hi yatrāpi samayaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1716: bhaje śvetadvīpaṃ tam aham iha golokam iti yaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1720: tad evaṃ nijeṣṭa-devaṃ bhajanīyatvena stutvā tena viśiṣṭaṃ tal lokaṃ tathā
GR14brhms5cu:1724: tāsām anantānām apy eka eva kāntaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:1725: iti parama-nārāyaṇādibhyo'pi tasya tat-tal-lokebhyo'pi tadīya-lokasya cāsya
GR14brhms5cu:1727: kalpa-taravo drumāḥ iti teṣāṃ sarveṣām eva
GR14brhms5cu:1729: bhūmir ity ādikaṃ ca tadvad bhūmir api sarva-spṛhāṃ dadāti kim uta
GR14brhms5cu:1731: toyam apy amṛtam iva svādu kim utāmṛtam ity ādi / vaṃśī
GR14brhms5cu:1735: ca nitya-pūrṇa-candratvāt tathā tad eva param api tat tat prakāśyam apīty
GR14brhms5cu:1737: tathā tad eva teṣām āsvādyaṃ bhogyam api ca cic-chaktimayatvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1738: darśayāmāsa lokaṃ svaṃ gopānāṃ tamasaḥ param [BhP 10.28.14] iti
GR14brhms5cu:1743: gandha-rūpaṃ svādu-rūpaṃ dravyaṃ puṣpādikaṃ ca yat /
GR14brhms5cu:1744: heyāṃśānām abhāvāc ca rasa-rūpaṃ bhavec ca tat //
GR14brhms5cu:1745: tvag-bījaṃ caiva heyāṃśaṃ kaṭhināṃśaṃ ca yad bhavet /
GR14brhms5cu:1746: sarvaṃ tad bhautikaṃ viddhi nahi bhūtamayaṃ hi tat /
GR14brhms5cu:1747: rasavad bhautikaṃ dravyam atra syād rasa-rūpakam // iti /
GR14brhms5cu:1748: surabhībhyaś ca saratīti tvadīya-vaṃśī-dhvany-ādy-āveśād iti bhāvaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1749: vrajati nahīti tad-āveśena te tad-vāsinaḥ kālam api na jānantīti bhāvaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1751: na ca kālaḥ vikramaḥ [BhP 2.9.10] iti dvitīyāt /
GR14brhms5cu:1754: tiṣṭhati tathā-bhūmyāṃ hi tiṣṭhati [GTU 2.27] iti tāpanībhyaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1756: uktaṃ yaṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve pṛcchanto'pi pitāmaham [HV 62.29] iti // 56 //
GR14brhms5cu:1759: brahman mahattva-vijñāne prajā-sarge ca cen matiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1760: pañca-ślokīm imāṃ vidyāṃ vatsa dattāṃ nibodha me //
GR14brhms5cu:1763: tad evaṃ tasya stutim uktvā śrī-bhagavat-prasāda-lābham āha atheti / sarvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1770: tatra prasāda-rūpāṃ pañca-ślokīm āha prabuddha iti /
GR14brhms5cu:1775: bodhayan ātmanātmānaṃ bhaktim apy uttamāṃ labhet //
GR14brhms5cu:1780: pramāṇair bhagavac-chāstrais tat-sadācārais tadīyā ye santas
GR14brhms5cu:1781: teṣām ācārair anusṭānais tad-abhyāsais teṣām eva paunaḥpuṇyena bāhulyena
GR14brhms5cu:1782: ātmanā ātmānaṃ bodhayati svayam eva svaṃ bhagavad-āśritaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:1784: tato'py uttamāṃ śuddhāṃ bhaktiṃ labhata iti /
GR14brhms5cu:1789: bhavata upāsate 'ṅghrim abhavaṃ bhuvi viśvasitāḥ // [BhP 10.87.20] iti // 59 //
GR14brhms5cu:1791: yasyāḥ śreyas-karaṃ nāsti yayā nirvṛtim āpnuyāt /
GR14brhms5cu:1792: yā sādhayati mām eva bhaktiṃ tām eva sādhayet //
GR14brhms5cu:1794: dharmān anyān parityajya mām ekaṃ bhaja viśvasan /
GR14brhms5cu:1795: yādṛśī yādṛśī śraddhā siddhir bhavati tādṛśī // // BrS_5.71 //
GR14brhms5cu:1797: tenaiva karmaṇā dhyāyan māṃ parāṃ bhaktim icchati //
GR14brhms5cu:1800: punaḥ śuddhām eva sādhana-bhaktiṃ draḍhayann akāmair api tām eva
GR14brhms5cu:1801: kuryād ity āha - dharmān anyān iti / tad uktaṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:1803: tīvreṇa bhakti-yogena yajeta puruṣaṃ param // [BhP 2.3.10] iti // 61 //
GR14brhms5cu:1811: tasmāt tava sisṛkṣāpi phaliṣyatīti sa-yuktikam āha - ahaṃ hīti / pradhānaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1815: kiṃ bahunā tavam api mayā āhitaṃ arpitaṃ teja idaṃ bibharṣi,
GR14brhms5cu:1817: mat-tejasā jaganti sarvāṇi sthāvara-jaṅgamāni he vidhe hi kurv iti //62//
